channel.title: NPC help!
channel.description: hi i have spwan a jad and now i wanna let him drop a firecape im a beginner at code but when i go to npcdrops i add the code: npcdrop = 2745 1 6570 1 2475 = jad but it dont dropt it can you help me plz! btw i have compile it!

item.title: NPC help!
item.dc:creator: @Maxammus Maxammus
item.description:
@Maxammus wrote:

npcdrop = 2745	6570	1	1

The syntax is
npcdrop = npcid itemid itemamount %drop

Read full topic
